Original:
很浪漫的 Coffee & Bar ，店裏許多老闆收藏的精緻古董家具，很浪漫。還有鋼琴有不定時演奏，也歡迎客人來彈奏分享琴聲～
今天和電影圈前輩來，巧遇兩位第一天來台灣旅遊的兩個德國美女，開心聊起天來了，哈哈哈哈哈！果然是讓人放鬆的浪漫小天地～
今天的艷遇除了兩位德國美女，還有四隻漂亮的貓咪！都不怕生好可愛喔！
咖啡師店主超帥，哈哈哈哈哈
EN:
Very romantic Coffee & Bar, exquisite antique furniture collected by many bosses in the store, very romantic.There are also piano to perform from time to time, and guests are welcome to play and share piano sound ~
Today, I came with the predecessors of the film industry. I happened to meet two German beauties who came to Taiwan on the first day.Sure enough, a relaxed romantic little world ~
In addition to two German beauties today, there are four beautiful cats!I'm not afraid of being so cute!
The owner of the barista shop is super handsome, hahahahahaha

Original:
很有氣氛的酒吧，還有可以的貓貓當店員👍。
老闆調的酒都很好喝，想要的感覺都能調到位，還有一個極推的就是廣島生蠔🦪，真的是蠔蠔吃又好喝，讚啦
EN:
A very atmospheric bar, and the cats who can be a cat as a clerk.
The wine tuned by the boss is very delicious, and the feeling you want can be adjusted in place. There is also a very pushing one of Hiroshima oysters. It is really oyster and delicious.

Original:
首先，這個地方有 4 隻貓，所以它自動獲得最低 4 星。

調酒師也非常友好和熱情。他收藏了大量的商品，探索和觀看都很有趣。另外，喝了幾杯後彈鋼琴也很有趣。

氣氛溫馨，就像某人的家一樣，就像您正在與好朋友一起喝一杯。

非常有趣的談話，飲料也很有創意。
EN:
First of all, there are 4 cats in this place, so it automatically gets a minimum of 4 stars.

The bartender is also very friendly and enthusiastic.He collects a lot of goods, and it is very interesting to explore and watch.In addition, it is also interesting to drink a few cups of piano.

The atmosphere is warm, just like someone's home, just like you are drinking a drink with good friends.

Very interesting conversation, and drinks are also very creative.
